logout_dialog.content: Are you sure you want to logout from your Twake?

success.body:
Your Twake is being updated.
You will receive a notification as soon as your purchase is finalized.

cozyNotFound.body: We could not find any Twake at this address. It may be a typo. To know, check the address of your Twake in the email we sent you when it was created.
cozyNotFound.title: This Twake address does not exist.

SecureScreen.passwordprompt_body: Access to your device is not secure. Choose a password to secure access to your Twake.
SecureScreen.pinprompt_body: Access your app faster by enabling app unlock with PIN code

login.invalidMagicCode: The link to access your Twake is truncated or has expired

welcome.body: Access your Personal Cloud now, the digital home to gather all your data
welcome.buttonLogin: I already have a Personal Cloud
welcome.title: Personal Cloud

IconChangedModal.description: The icon of the 'Twake' application has been modified.

ErrorToken.body: It seems you have revoked this device from your Twake. To access your data again, please log in again. If you did not perform this action, please feel free to contact us at <linkTag>{{email}}</linkTag>.
